Class ProductionLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProductionLine

  • public class ProductionLine
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Queue<Disk> input
      Input Queue of Disks on the ProductionLine implemented as a LinkedList.
      private java.util.Queue<Tower> output
      Output Queue of Towers from the ProductionLine implemented as a LinkedList.
      private Tower robotArm
      Temporary Tower to add Disks from the input queue before unloading onto the output Queue.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductionLine()
      Default Constructor that initializes the input and output Queues as well as the robotArm Tower.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDisk(Disk disk)
      Adds a Disk to the input queue
      boolean hasOutput()
      Checks if the output Queue is empty
      void process()
      Processes the input Disks to determine if they should be stacked on the robotArm, or if the robotArm should be unloaded.
      Tower removeTower()
      Removes a Tower from the front of the Queue and returns it
      void unloadRobot()
      Flips the robotArm Tower, adds to the output Queue and initializes robotArm as a new Tower.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • input

        private java.util.Queue<Disk> input
        Input Queue of Disks on the ProductionLine implemented as a LinkedList.

      • output

        private java.util.Queue<Tower> output
        Output Queue of Towers from the ProductionLine implemented as a LinkedList.

      • robotArm

        private Tower robotArm
        Temporary Tower to add Disks from the input queue before unloading onto the output Queue.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductionLine

        public ProductionLine()
        Default Constructor that initializes the input and output Queues as well as the robotArm Tower.

    • Method Detail

      • addDisk

        public void addDisk(Disk disk)
        Adds a Disk to the input queue
        Parameters:
        disk - Disk object to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Disk object is null

      • unloadRobot

        public void unloadRobot()
        Flips the robotArm Tower, adds to the output Queue and initializes robotArm as a new Tower.

      • process

        public void process()
        Processes the input Disks to determine if they should be stacked on the robotArm, or if the robotArm should be unloaded. Loops until the input Queue is empty. Disks will be stacked only if their radius' are equal or greater than the topmost Disk on the robotArm Tower. The robotArm will be unloaded when a Disk is not greater than the topmost Disk.

      • removeTower

        public Tower removeTower()
        Removes a Tower from the front of the Queue and returns it
        Returns:
        Tower object from the output Queue
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the output Queue is empty

      • hasOutput

        public boolean hasOutput()
        Checks if the output Queue is empty
        Returns:
        whether the output Queue is empty
